props.centerActive: Forces the selected component to be centered.
props.direction: Switch between horizontal and vertical modes.
props.mobileBreakpoint: Sets the designated mobile breakpoint for the component.
props.nextIcon: The appended slot when arrows are shown.
props.prevIcon: The prepended slot when arrows are shown.
props.showArrows: Change when the overflow arrow indicators are shown. By **default**, arrows *always* display on Desktop when the container is overflowing. When the container overflows on mobile, arrows are not shown by default. A **show-arrows** value of `true` allows these arrows to show on Mobile if the container overflowing. A value of `desktop` *always* displays arrows on Desktop while a value of `mobile` always displays arrows on Mobile. A value of `always` always displays arrows on Desktop *and* Mobile. Find more information on how to customize breakpoint thresholds on the [breakpoints page](/customizing/breakpoints).

events.change: Emitted when the component value is changed by user interaction.
events.click:prev: Emitted when the prev is clicked.
events.click:next: Emitted when the next is clicked.

exposed.hasNext: Returns true if there are items after current index.
exposed.hasPrev: Returns true if there are items before current index.
exposed.scrollOffset: Scroll the component to a given index.
exposed.scrollTo: Scroll the component to a given index.
